original_text: He went to the leaders of the priests and he talked with them. The police that worked at the temple were also there. Judas told them how he could give Jesus to them secretly.
korean_text: 이에 유다가 대제사장들과 성전 경비대장들에게 가서 예수를 넘겨 줄 방도를 의논하매

sentences.original_text: He went to the leaders of the priests
The police that worked at the temple
how he could give Jesus to them secretly
sentences.korean_translation: 어떻게 그가 예수님을 비밀리에 그들에게 넘겨줄 수 있는지를
